item.name: Recall
item.hint: Recall definitions; terminology; number properties; geometric properties; and notation (e.g., a x b = ab, a + a + a = 3a).

item.name: Recognize
item.hint: Recognize mathematical objects, e.g., shapes, numbers, expressions, and quantities. Recognize mathematical entities that are mathematically equivalent (e.g., equivalent familiar fractions, decimals and percents; different orientations of simple geometric figures).

item.name: Compute
item.hint: Carry out algorithmic procedures for +, -, x, /, or a combination of these with whole numbers, fractions, decimals and integers. Approximate numbers to estimate computations. Carry out routine algebraic procedures.

item.name: Retrieve
item.hint: Retrieve information from graphs, tables, or other sources; read simple scales.

item.name: Measure
item.hint: Use measuring instruments; choose appropriate units of measurement.

item.name: Classify/Order
item.hint: Classify/group objects, shapes, numbers, and expressions according to common properties; make correct decisions about class membership; and order numbers and objects by attributes.
